content: 64 sts total pick up 13 14 sts along right side of heel flap pick up 1 stitch in gap foot between heel flap and instep sts work continue knitting in pattern until sock instep stitches in pattern as measures 7 8 inches from beginning of established from chart heel or until desired length before pick up 1 stitch in gap between instep beginning toe sts and heel flap pick up 13 14 sts along left side of heel flap knit to toe middle of heel this is the new round 1 knit beginning of round rearrange sts as round 2 knit to m k2tog k2 ssk knit needed on needles to m k2tog k2 ssk k to end repeat rounds 1 and 2 five times eliminate the gaps repeat round 2 until 20 stitches round 1 knit continuing to work instep remain sts in pattern knit 5 sts graft 10 upper and lower stitches together round 2 knit to 2 sts before instep sts k2tog knit instep sts in pattern as established ssk knit to end of round © 2014 robin sample sorbet socks all rights reserved contact octoberhouseshop@gmail com chart questions errata email me - octoberhouseshop@gmail com about the designer robin sample knits spins dyes and otherwise plays with yarn and fiber she is the owner of october house fiber arts and believes no ensemble is complete without dog hair she blogs at octoberhouse blogspot com and spends a lot of time on ravelry as octoberhouse this pattern is intended for private use only please do not reproduce except to make a working copy the pattern may not be used for commercial purposes without the written consent of the designer www octoberhousefiberarts com © 2014 robin sample sorbet socks all rights reserved contact octoberhouseshop@gmail com
